Gym Fitness

URL:

Gym Fitness

Agency:

Pixel Bottom

Challenge:

I wanted to build a WordPress theme that I could use as a template. It would have widgets and plugins create especially that could be modified to suit the website.

Solution:

While I have experience with WordPress and creating themes I had no experience with creating widgets and Plugins. I researched how to build both by watching a few tutorials and then created them for the project.

Features:

  • ->  Bespoke theme
  • ->  Bespoke Widgets + Plugins

Technology:

HTML, CSS, JavsScript, PHP, WordPress
